entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
